page.title: 17NORRIS GREEN PROBLEMS,L'POOL
page.content:
NORRIS GREEN HAS A LOT OF{UNEMPLOYMENT AND THERE IS A LOT OF {VANDALISM.}OUR SCHOOL HAS BEEN BROKEN INTO A LOT RECENTLY BUT I THINK THAT THE{ {LACK OF JOBS IN TNE AREA HAS MUCH TO {DO WITH THE CRIME. { ************************************** **************************************
{ NORRIS GREEN}IS NOT A GOOD PLACE, ALL THE{LITTER}ABOUT IS A DISGRACE, PEOPLE ON{DRUGS. AND LOADS OF{MUGGERS. WE NEED MORE PLAY AREAS, WE NEED BETTER HOUSES, WE CAN DO WITH LESS{TEENAGE GANGS, BECAUSE ALL THEY DO IS WRITE ON WALLS
************************************** **************************************
